title: Back In The Zone
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we ease into the new year by sharing what we did over our month long break plus a few pop culture items that went down while we were gone, like twitter being divided over WWIII memes and the Duke and Duchess of Sussex wanting out of the Monarchy. And much much more!

The Friend Zone Live at Sony Hall!
Thursday, February 13th
Cabaret style seating with full dinner menu available
Tickets: https://www.sonyhall.com/events/the-friend-zone

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Children of Virtue and Vengeance - -	This episode is brought to you by CHILDREN OF VIRTUE AND VENGEANCE, the instant #1 New York Times bestseller and stunning sequel to Tomi Adeyemi's novel CHILDREN OF BLOOD AND BONE. The New York Times says Tomi "poses thought-provoking questions about race, class and authority.” This sweeping fantasy series is described as "Black Panther" with magic, bringing both black lives matter and black girl magic into a fictional West African world inspired by Tomi's Nigerian roots. If you haven't read CHILDREN OF BLOOD AND BONE and CHILDREN OF VIRTUE AND VENGEANCE yet, now is the time! A movie is already in development with Lucasfilm and it's sure to be the next blockbuster hit. Join the phenomenon and see why everyone is talking about CHILDREN OF VIRTUE AND VENGEANCE. Read it now!

Native - Many conventional deodorants contain aluminum, which forms a plug in your sweat glands to keep you from sweating. But Native’s deodorant is made without aluminum, parabens, or talc, so you can feel better about what you’re putting on your body. Native deodorant is made with ingredients you’ve heard of, like coconut oil and shea butter – it’s also vegan and never tested on animals. And it really works! Native will keep you smelling and feeling fresh all day long. With over 10 scents, including their classics like Coconut & Vanilla, and rotating seasonals, you’re guaranteed to find one you love. For 20% off your first purchase, visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FRIENDZONE during checkout. That’s https://www.nativecos.com and promo code FRIENDZONE for 20% off your first purchase.

Door Dash - Long day at work? Tough day at school? Still suck at the office? Treat yourself to the meal you deserve, on-demand from your favorite restaurant. And the restaurants come directly to you with Doordash! DoorDash connects you to your favorite restaurants in your city. Ordering is easy. Just use the DoorDash app and choose what you want to eat, and a Dasher will bring it to you, anywhere you are. Not only is that burger place you love on DoorDash already, but over 310,000 other amazing restaurants are, too. Doordash connects you with door-to-door delivery in over 3,300 cities, all 50 states, and Canada. Right now, our listeners can get $5 off their first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter promo code THEFRIENDZONE. That’s $5 off your first order, when you download the DoorDash app from the App Store and enter promo code THEFRIENDZONE.

Follow us online:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
